metadata.title: CVE-2020-0550 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Improper data forwarding in some data cache for some Intel(R) Processorsmay allow an authenticated user to potentially enable informationdisclosure via local access. The list of affected products is provided inintel-sa-00330:https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/security-center/advisory/intel-sa-00330.html

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
